DOC.brief_summary: It has been shown that the use of volatile anaesthetics, that are usually used to perform a general anesthesia, have cardioprotective properties. This has been shown in animal studies and in patients that underwent cardiac surgery. The aim of our study is to examine if Sevoflurane, a volatile anaesthetic, has this properties in patients undergoing lung surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Cardioprotection by Sevoflurane Preconditioning in Noncardiac Thoracic Surgery
